## Known Risk Factors

$$\log(\text{Odds}(\text{AKI}=1)) = \beta_0 + \beta_1\text{Age} + \beta_2\text{APACHE}_\text{II} + \beta_3\text{APACHE}_\text{III} + \\
  \beta_4\text{Cr}_\text{Baseline} + \beta_5\text{PCs_Cardio} + \beta_6\text{Vasopressor} + \beta_7\text{Diabetes} + \\
  \beta_8\text{AF} + \beta_9\text{IHD} + \beta_10\text{HF} + \beta_11\text{HT} + \beta_12\text{PVD} + \beta_13\text{Chronic_Liver_Disease}$$
